We were traveling with some elderly family, so we were extremely appreciative of the numerous handicap-accessible features like handlebars and grips in the bathrooms and some other rooms. The neighborhood was quiet, and parking was sufficient.
The main downside for us, since we also were traveling with small children, was the lack of a real bathtub for their bathtime. There is a master bath with a shower (plenty of hot water!) and a main bath with a walk-in tub, so it would work well for some people but did not match the pictures we saw of a real, normal tub. If you have small children, just ensure they are good in the shower. Overall, we fully recommend Breannaâ€™s place, and we would stay there again.

Breanna is lighting fast with the communication and her kindness epitomizes the Southern Hospitality that one hopes for when visiting Georgia.
The house is adorable, functional, clean, and has so many little perks that makes the value for this home such a treasure!
I loved that I could close off the sleeping quarters from the living areas so that my littlest could still maintain an early bedtime while everyone else could stay awake play darts, enjoy snacks, and watch TV (there are 3 tv's!).
When I was tired, I was also able to close my portion of the house off from the community areas and the fun continued for everyone else while I slept peacefully on the most comfortably firm mattress I've ever experienced away from home.
When I woke up early to enjoy my yoga practice, I was able to carry on without disturbing the (now sleeping) night owls.
The neighborhood is peaceful and clean.
The driveway is a dream, you can pull all the way into property and turn your car around so that you don't have to back out into traffic when you leave.
Gently try out the doorbell. It sounds like the bells of heaven.
The refrigerator has a filtered water dispenser! Even though I packed my own water (I'm funny about water), it was awesome that Breanna offers this little perk!
The tile floor in the back bathroom is just lovely! The shower has an adjustable, removable head so you can be sure to get as clean as you would hope!
If I ever just want to get away for an evening or 3, I will seek out Miss Breanna's Brilliant Bungalow!
I hope you enjoy your stay as much as I did.
